price: ߦߙߌߘߋ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߦߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߦߋ߲߬ ߸ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߝߋ߲߫ ߡߊߞߟߌߕߊ ߟߎ߬ ߝߣߊ߫ ߦߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫
arabic: لَهُمۡ فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٞ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: lahum fīhā fākihatun walahum mā yaddaʿūna
